cinnamon.engine.utils

Class MutableSphereBounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Bounds
      • cinnamon.engine.utils.SphereBounds
        • cinnamon.engine.utils.MutableSphereBounds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copier<SphereBounds>, DefinableBounds, Position, Size

    public final class MutableSphereBounds
extends SphereBounds
implements DefinableBounds, Copier<SphereBounds>

    Provides methods for changing the size and position of a SphereBounds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MutableSphereBounds()
      Constructs a MutableSphereBounds at origin (0,0,0) whose radius is 1.
      MutableSphereBounds(float radius, float x, float y, float z)
      Constructs a MutableSphereBounds with the specified radius centered on the given point.
      MutableSphereBounds(float radius, Point point)
      Constructs a MutableSphereBounds with the specified radius centered on the given point.
      MutableSphereBounds(SphereBounds sphere)
      Constructs a MutableSphereBounds from another SphereBounds.

      • encompass

        public void encompass(float x,
                      float y,
                      float z)
        Description copied from interface: DefinableBounds

        Resizes to include the given point.

        Unlike DefinableBounds.encompass(Point, Point), this overload does not make any previously contained point uncontained, i.e. the shape stretches to include the point.

        Specified by:
        encompass in interface DefinableBounds
        Parameters:
        x - x.
        y - y.
        z - z.
